alert.note: Alert for Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 17 at 7:58PM CDT until May 18 at 1:34PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Texas... Atascosa River at Whitsett affecting Live Oak County. ...FLOOD WARNING IS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Atascosa River at Whitsett. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, minor lowland flooding reaches the lowest areas of crop and pastureland. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday, the stage was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Atascosa River Whitsett 20.0 20.3 Wed 7 pm 16.2 10.9 6.5 4.5 3.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
